column3:
先の戦いで功績のあった方には報酬が
出たそうですわ――
column4:
I heard that there was a reward for those
who made a difference in the last battle!

column3:
でも私にとっては弟の元気な姿が
何よりの報酬です
column4:
But for me, the best reward is to see
my brother in good health.

column3:
戦場で活躍したみんなに報酬が
出たみたいですね
column4:
It seems that everyone who performed well
on the battlefield received a reward!

column3:
私もいつか、みなさんの隣りで
活躍できたらなって思うんです
column4:
I dream of being able to contribute
alongside everyone one day.

column3:
先の戦いで手柄に応じた報酬が出た
という話だ
column4:
I heard that rewards were given for your
achievements in the previous battle.

column3:
教官である今の俺にとっては、お前の活躍と
全身に刻み込まれた古傷が一番の誇りよ
column4:
For me, as your mentor,
your success is most important to me.
Furthermore, the litany of ancient scars
on one's body brings me great pride.

column3:
こたびの戦いの戦果に応じた報酬を配布中だ
防衛に参加してくれた全ての者は受け取ってくれ
column4:
We are currently distributing rewards based on
the results of the battle.
Please make sure to claim your rewards if you
participated in the defense.

column3:
報酬は出たけれど、これじゃぁまだ姉さんに
報告するわけにはいかないなぁ
column4:
I got the reward, but this isn't enough 
to report back to my sister yet.

column3:
いくら稼いだんだ？
俺にも少しくらい分けてくれよ
column4:
How much did you earn?
You gotta share some of that with me.

column3:
報酬はもう受け取ったのか？
お前の活躍、嬉しいんだけど副隊長の注目が
集まると思うと複雑なんだよなぁ――
column4:
Have you already received your rewards?
I'm happy about your achievements,
but I can't help feeling conflicted when
the Vice Captain's attention is drawn to you.

column3: 油断するな
column4: Don't let your guard down.

column3: 悪くない――その調子だ
column4: Not bad -- that's the way.

column3: 目の前の敵に集中するんだ
column4: Focus on the enemy in front of you.

column3: 切り込むぞ！
column4: Let's cut them down!

column3: よし、ここは制圧した
column4: Okay, we're in control here.

column3: それで良い、次に向かうぞ！
column4: Excellent, let's move on!

column3: 新手の敵だ、注意しろ！
column4: It's a new enemy, beware!

column3: 今こそ名をあげる時だ――
column4: Now is the time to make a name for yourself--

column3: 相変わらずの臭いだな
column4: The stench is still the same as always.

column3: 今日こそ決着を付けてくれる！
column4: Today is the day to settle this!

column3: 逃がしたか――
column4: Did they escape?

column3: 覚者の命、全て狩り取ってくれるわ
column4: I will take the lives of all Arisen.

column3: 覚者の命は値千金！　奪え！
column4: The life of an Arisen is invaluable! Seize it!

column3: 今日はここまでだ
column4: This day shall be your last!

column3: まさか――この――俺が――
column4: I can't believe... that I...

column3: ほら、よそ見しない！
column4: Hey, keep your eyes on the prize!

column3: はやくやっちゃって！
column4: Let's end this quickly!

column3: こっちにまわさないで！
column4: Don't bring it over here!

column3: さぁ、大掃除の開始よ！
column4: Alright, it's time to start mopping up!

column3: その調子その調子！
column4: Keep it up, keep it up!

column3: 良い感じ良い感じ！
column4: Looking good, looking good!

column3: ちょ、ちょっと――頼むわよ！
column4: Wait, wait a moment... please!

column3: これって大変じゃない！？
column4: Isn't this quite difficult?!

column3: こんなの聞いてないわよぉ
column4: I didn't ask for this!

column3: ほらほらお願い頑張って！
column4: Come on, come on, please do your best!

column3: 残念――せっかく調子でてきたのに――
column4: What a shame—just when I was getting into it.

column3: 覚者の命、全て狩り取ってくれるわ
column4: I will take the lives of all Arisen.

column3: これは楽しめそうだな、褐色の女戦士よ
column4: This seems promising, warrior.

column3: 覚者の命は値千金！　奪え！
column4: The life of an Arisen is invaluable! Seize it!

column3: ほう――その細腕でやるな
column4:
Well - you've got some real skills
with those skinny arms of yours.

column3: 今日はここまでだ
column4: This day shall be your last!

column3: おまえの力では俺は倒せぬわ
column4: You can't beat me with your own strength.

column3: まさか――この――俺が――
column4: I can't believe... that I...

column3: うがあぁぁぁぁぁぁ――
column4: Ughhhhhh--

column3: 気を抜くなよ
column4: Don't let your guard down.

column3: 良い動きだ！
column4: Good move!

column3: 落ち着いて仕留めるんだ！
column4: Stay calm and finish them off!

column3: さあ！全ての敵を切り倒せ！
column4: Okay! Cut down every enemy!

column3: この調子で駆け抜けるぞ！
column4: Push through at this pace!

column3: よくやった、付いてこい！
column4: Well done, follow me!

column3: 新手の敵だ、突撃するぞ！
column4: It's a new enemy. We're going to charge them!

column3: 来たぞ、集中しろ！
column4: Here they come, concentrate!

column3: ほう――大将のお出ましだ
column4: Ho—the general is here

column3: こいつは手強いな
column4: This one is tough.

column3: 逃げ足の速い奴だ
column4: They're fast on their feet.

column3: おっとっと
column4: Oops!

column3: 敵の動きをよく見るんだ――
column4: Watch your enemy's movements--

column3: 無理するなよ――
column4: Don't push yourself too hard...

column3: さーて、どうなることやら
column4: Well, let's see what happens.

column3: 怪我はないか？
column4: Are you hurt?

column3: 上出来だね
column4: Well done.

column3: なるようにしかならんか
column4: It can't be helped.

column3: ここは覚悟の決め時か――
column4: This is the time to decide――

column3: まだおわりって訳じゃぁないだろう？
column4: It's not the end yet, is it?

column3: なかなかやるじゃないか
column4: You've got some skills.

column3: よくやった、深追いする必要はない――
column4: Well done, there's no need to press further――

column3: 覚者の命、全て狩り取ってくれるわ
column4: I will take the lives of all Arisen.

column3: 会いに来てやったぞ、金色の戦士よ
column4: I have come to meet you, golden warrior.

column3: 覚者の命は値千金！　奪え！
column4: The life of an Arisen is invaluable! Seize it!

column3: 楽しませてくれる
column4: You're providing some entertainment.

column3: 今日はここまでだ
column4: This day shall be your last!

column3: 次を心待ちにしているぞ
column4: I'm looking forward to the next one.

column3: まさか――この――俺が――
column4: I can't believe... that I...

column3: 存分に楽しませてもらったぞ――
column4: I've thoroughly enjoyed myself――

column3: オラオラオラオラ！
column4: Ora ora ora ora!

column3: こっちは任せろ！
column4: Leave it to me!

column3: ぶちかましてやるぜ！
column4: I'll give you a good beating!

column3: おーし、おっぱじめるか！
column4: All right, let's begin!

column3: よくやった、良い根性だ！
column4: Well done, you've got a good spirit!

column3: ちゃっちゃと終わらせるぞ
column4: Let's finish this quickly.

column3: こいつぁ嬉しくなってくるね
column4: I'm starting to feel happy about this.

column3: 血わき肉躍るとはこのことだ！
column4:
This is the thrill of blood pumping 
and flesh moving!

column3: 敵に舐められたら終いだぞ
column4: If you underestimate the enemy, it's over.

column3: アアアア！
column4: Aaaaaah!

column3: ま、こんなもんだろ
column4: I guess this is how it goes.

column3: 森の中ほどとはいかないけれど――
column4: It's not exactly in the middle of the forest, but...

column3: 造作ない――
column4: No big deal...

column3: 気をつけて――
column4: Be careful...

column3:
まだ倒れてもらっては困る
――手を貸そう
column4:
You can't fall just yet.
――Let me lend a hand.

column3: ここはもう大丈夫だ――
column4: We're all good here--

column3: よし、次だ
column4: Alright, next.

column3: うん？――招かざる客の登場だ
column4:
Hmm?
—An uninvited guest has arrived.

column3:
逢瀬の誘いのようだけど
次の機会に――とはいかなさそうだね
column4:
Seems like an invitation for a rendezvous,
but that will have to wait until next time.

column3: こいつは僕が引きつけよう
column4: I'll draw this one's attention.

column3: この命、簡単には渡せないな
column4: This life, I'm not gonna give it to you so easily.

column3: 覚者さんたち――やるね
column4: Arisen, you sure know how to get it done!

column3: 覚者の命、全て狩り取ってくれるわ
column4: I will take the lives of all Arisen.

column3: 覚者の命は値千金！　奪え！
column4: The life of an Arisen is invaluable! Seize it!

column3: 今日はここまでだ
column4: This day shall be your last!

column3: まさか――この――俺が――
column4: I can't believe... that I...

column3: おっとっと
column4: Oops!

column3: 敵の動きをよく見るんだ――
column4: Watch your enemy's movements--

column3: 無理するなよ――
column4: Don't push yourself too hard...

column3: さーて、どうなることやら
column4: Well, let's see what happens.

column3: 怪我はないか？
column4: Are you hurt?

column3: 上出来だね
column4: Well done.

column3: なるようにしかならんか
column4: It can't be helped.

column3: ここは覚悟の決め時か――
column4: This is the time to decide――

column3: なかなかやるじゃないか

column4: Now is the time to make a name for yourself--

column3: 相変わらずの臭いだな

column3: 今日こそ決着を付けてくれる！

column3: 逃がしたか――
column4: Did they escape?

column3: ほら、よそ見しない！
column4: Hey, keep your eyes on the prize!

column3: はやくやっちゃって！
column4: Let's end this quickly!

column3: こっちにまわさないで！
column4: Don't bring it over here!

column3: さぁ、大掃除の開始よ！
column4: Alright, it's time to start mopping up!

column3: その調子その調子！
column4: Keep it up, keep it up!

column3: 良い感じ良い感じ！
column4: Looking good, looking good!

column3: ちょ、ちょっと――頼むわよ！
column4: Wait, wait a moment... please!

column3: これって大変じゃない！？
column4: Isn't this quite difficult?!

column3: こんなの聞いてないわよぉ
column4: I didn't ask for this!

column3: ほらほらお願い頑張って！
column4: Come on, come on, please do your best!

column4: I will take the lives of all Arisen.

column3: 覚者の命は値千金！　奪え！

Well - you've got some real skills
with those skinny arms of yours.

column4: I can't believe... that I...

column3: うがあぁぁぁぁぁぁ――
column4: Ughhhhhh--

column3: 良い動きだ！

column3: 落ち着いて仕留めるんだ！

column3: 新手の敵だ、突撃するぞ！
column4: It's a new enemy. We're going to charge them!

column3: 来たぞ、集中しろ！
column4: Here they come, concentrate!

column3: ほう――大将のお出ましだ
column4: Ho—the general is here

column3: こいつは手強いな
column4: This one is tough.

column3: 逃げ足の速い奴だ
column4: They're fast on their feet.

column3: 油断するな
column4: Don't let your guard down.

column3: 悪くない――その調子だ
column4: Not bad. Keep it up.

column3: 目の前の敵に集中するんだ
column4: Focus on the enemy in front of you.

column3: 切り込むぞ！
column4: Let's cut them down!

column3: よし、ここは制圧した
column4: Good, we have taken control here.

column3: それで良い、次に向かうぞ！
column4: That's good. Let's move on to the next one.

column3: 新手の敵だ、注意しろ！
column4: A new type of enemy, be careful!

column3: 今こそ名をあげる時だ――
column4: Now is the time to make a name for yourself.

column3: 相変わらずの臭いだな
column4: The smell is still the same as always.

column3: 今日こそ決着を付けてくれる！
column4: Today is the day we settle this!

column3: 逃がしたか――
column4: Did they escape?

column3: 覚者の命、全て狩り取ってくれるわ
column4: I will take the lives of all Arisen.

column3: 会いに来てやったぞ、金色の戦士よ
column4: I have come to meet you, golden warrior.

column3: 覚者の命は値千金！　奪え！
column4: The life of an Arisen is invaluable! Seize it!

column3: 楽しませてくれる
column4: Let me entertain you.

column3: 今日はここまでだ
column4: Today is the end.

column3: 次を心待ちにしているぞ
column4: I am looking forward to the next one.

column3: まさか――この――俺が――
column4: I can't believe... that I...

column3: 存分に楽しませてもらったぞ――
column4: I've thoroughly enjoyed myself――

column3: ほら、よそ見しない！
column4: Look, don't get distracted!

column3: はやくやっちゃって！
column4: Get it over with!

column3: こっちにまわさないで！
column4: Don't bring it over here!

column3: さぁ、大掃除の開始よ！
column4: Alright, it's time to start mopping up!

column3: その調子その調子！
column4: Keep it up, keep it up!

column3: 良い感じ良い感じ！
column4: Looking good, looking good!

column3: 気を抜くなよ
column4: Don't let your guard down.

column3: 良い動きだ！
column4: Good move!

column3: 落ち着いて仕留めるんだ！
column4: Stay calm and finish them off!

column3: さあ！全ての敵を切り倒せ！
column4: Okay! Cut down every enemy!

column3: この調子で駆け抜けるぞ！
column4: Push through at this pace!

column3: よくやった、付いてこい！
column4: Well done, follow me!

column3: ほう――大将のお出ましだ
column4: Well - here comes the general.

column3: こいつは手強いな
column4: This one is tough.

column3: 覚者の命、全て狩り取ってくれるわ
column4: I will take the lives of all Arisen.

column3: 会いに来てやったぞ、金色の戦士よ
column4: I have come to meet you, golden warrior.

column3: 覚者の命は値千金！　奪え！
column4: The life of an Arisen is invaluable! Seize it!

column3: 楽しませてくれる
column4: Let me entertain you.

column3: まさか――この――俺が――
column4: I can't believe... that I...

column3: 存分に楽しませてもらったぞ――
column4: I've thoroughly enjoyed myself――

column3:
《竜の巣》の魔物は
レスタニアのそれとは訳が違う
特にドラゴンはなおさらだ！
column4:
The monsters of the "Dragon's Nest"
are different from those of Lestania,
especially the dragons!

column3:
今のうちに夢とロマンで
心を満たしておくといい！
恐怖でチャンスを逃すことのないようにな
column4:
Fill your heart with dreams and romance
while you still can!
Don't let fear keep you from taking chances.

column3:
開催期間になったら
再度、俺の元に参加を申し出てくれ！
column4:
When the event is held again,
please come back and participate!

column3: ゼルキンさんが船の準備をはじめたそうよ
column4:
It seems that Zerkin has started
preparing the ship.

column3:
危ないことはしないでほしいけれど
夢を追いかけることは素敵なことですよね
column4:
I don't want you to do anything dangerous, but...
it's nice to follow your dreams, isn't it?

column3:
詳しい情報はレスタニアニュースを
確認の上、神殿内の《港洞》の船上にいる
ゼルキンさんをお訪ねください
column4:
For more information,
please check the Lestania News and visit Zerkin,
who is on board the ship in the "Cave Harbor" 
within the Temple.

column3:
船長はバカほど海とロマンを愛してるんだ
おっとあんたもその口だったけか
column4:
Captains love the sea and romance
as much as any fool.
Oh wait, you're one of them, aren't you?

column3: ま、俺もそうだがよ――
column4: Well, I'm the same, you know...

column3:
うん、まもなく船の修理もおわり出航の準備も
整いつつあるよ
column4:
Yes, the repairs on the ship will be
finished soon and preparations for departure
are also coming together.

column3:
君も《竜の巣》に渡るつもりなら十分に仕度すると
いいね
column4:
If you're looking cross over
to the "Dragon's Nest" as well,
you'd better be well-prepared.

column3:
《竜の巣》に向かう船の準備で
港もいつもより活気がありますよね
column4:
When the ships start getting ready to head to the
"Dragon's Nest", the Harbor is always more lively
than usual.

column3:
《竜の巣》では覚者の力をもってしても
まともに太刀打ちできんだろう
column4:
Even with the power of Arisen,
one may not be able to stand a chance
in the "Dragon's Nest".

column3:
だが、上手くやれば名を上げられる
上手くやれなくても誇れる挑戦を手にできる
心が決まれば、船はいつでも出そうではないか！
column4:
But if you do well,
you can make a name for yourself.
If you don't, you can still get a challenge
that you can be proud of.
If your heart is set on it,
the ship can always set sail any time!

column3:
挑もうという覚悟と準備ができたなら
さっそくミッションエントリーしてくれ
column4:
If you've got the mettle to take it on,
enter the mission without delay!

column3:
また自分の成果がどの程度なのかは
神殿内の各所にあるランキングボードを
確認するといい
ほら、ロマンが呼んでいるぞっ！！
column4:
You can also check the ranking boards located
throughout the Temple to see how well you did.

column3:
ついに洋撃船が出航するそうですよ！
港の方々は大忙しです
column4:
It seems that the Western Expedition ship
will finally set sail!
The people at the port are very busy.

column3:
覚者さまも行かれるのですか？
無事帰ってきてお話聞かせてくださいね
column4:
Will you be going, Arisen?
Please return safely and tell us your story.

column3:
詳しい情報はレスタニアニュースを
確認の上、神殿内の《港洞》の船上にいる
ゼルキンさんをお訪ねください
column4:
For more information,
please check the Lestania News and visit Zerkin,
who is on board the ship in the "Cave Harbor"
within the Temple.

column3:
さぁ、洋撃船はいつでも出航できるぜ
《竜の巣》に渡りたいモノ好きどもがいればの
話だがな――
column4:
Come on, our ocean-going ship is ready to sail.
If there are those who want to cross over to the
"Dragon's Nest," this may be your opportunity...

column3:
けど、あんた
もしも行って戻ってこれたら
話ぐらいは聞かせてくれよな
column4:
Though, when you come back,
at least tell us your story.

column3:
いよいよ出航だね――
僕はこの時の港の雰囲気がたまらなく好きなんだ
column4:
It's finally time to set sail, huh――
I really love the atmosphere of the port at this time.

column3: 覚者さまも《竜の巣》に向かうのですか？
column4:
Ser Arisen, are you also heading to the Dragon's
Nest?

column3:
あそこに行くのは
よほど腕の立つ奴かただの命知らずだって
船乗りの兄はよく言っていました
column4:
My brother, who is a sailor, used to say that the
only people who go there are either very skilled
or just plain daredevils.

column3:
今は《竜の巣》での戦果の確認中だ！
働いた分の報酬は出るから、そう焦るな
column4:
I am currently verifying the results
of our battle at the Dragon's Nest!
Don't worry, you will receive your rewards for
the work you've done, so there's no need to rush.

column3: 《竜の巣》で大きな戦果をあげた人がいるようです
column4:
It seems that someone has achieved great results
at the Dragon's Nest.

column3:
もしかして、覚者さまが大活躍されたんですか？
ゼルキンさんからの発表が待ち遠しいですね
column4:
Could it be that the Arisen
has made a great contribution?
I can't wait for Zerkin's announcement.

column3: 船長が《竜の巣》で戦果をあげたものを確認中だ
column4:
The captain is currently confirming
the achievements at the Dragon's Nest.

column3:
《竜の巣》なんざぁ俺は行きたくないが
あそこでく繰り広げられた冒険譚を聞くのが
楽しみなんだよ
column4:
I don't want to go to the "Dragon's Nest",
but I'm looking forward to hearing about the
adventures that took place there.

column3:
今回もまた船が派手に壊れちゃったなぁ
さっそく修理に必要な見積もりを出さなくちゃ
column4:
Once again,
the ship has been spectacularly destroyed.
I must promptly request an estimate for repairs.

column3:
船が無事に帰ってきてうれしいです
いったいどんな冒険が繰り広げられたのでしょうか？
column4:
I am glad the ship returned safely.
I wonder what kind of adventure unfolded there?

column3:
ああ、今回の取り分は送っておいたぞ！
保管ボックスから確認してくれ
column4:
Ah, I've already sent your share for this time!
Please check it from the Storage Box.

column3:
あそこはとんでもなく危険なのにまた行きたくなる
そうだろう？　覚者よ！
column4:
It's a terribly dangerous place there, isn't it?
Yet you still want to go there, Arisen!

column3:
また次の航海を思い描けば船の修理にも
自ずと精が出るというものだ！
がはははは！
column4:
Just imagining the next voyage ahead
brings vigor to the ship repairs as well!
It's natural for spirits to rise, isn't it?
Gahahaha!

column3:
おぅ、丁度、戦果の集計がついたとこだ
これはあんたの報酬だ、受け取りな
column4:
Oh, just in time.
The results of the battle have been tallied.
This is your reward. Take it.

column3: 覚者さまのお名前も載っていると良いですね
column4:
It would be nice to have the name of the Arisen
included as well.

column3:
ゼルキンさんからのお知らせが
レスタニアニュースに載っています
column4:
There is an announcement from Zerkin
in the Lestania News.

column3:
あんた、ドラゴンや魔物はどうだった！？
今度一杯ご馳走するから
ゆっくり話を聞かせてくれよな
column4:
How were the dragons and monsters?!
I'll treat you to a drink next time,
so take your time and tell me your story.

column3:
船長は手に入れた報酬を
毎回、次の航海の資金にしている
column4:
The captain uses the rewards obtained
each time as funds for the next voyage.

column3:
ほんとあきれるけど
その情熱には感服するよ
column4: It's truly astounding, but I admire that passion.

column3: 海と冒険と竜との戦い、ロマンですよね――
column4:
The sea, adventure, and battles with dragons,
it's all so romantic, isn't it?

column3: 勇敢なる覚者よ、竜族を狙うのだ！
column4: Brave Arisen, aim for the Dragonkin!

column3: さすれば大物、エルダードラゴンをおびき出せるはずだ！
column4:
If we do that, we should be able to lure out a
formidable creature, the Elder Dragon!

column3: 《時番》を発見したら優先的に討伐するのだ！
column4:
When you find a "Time Bonus" enemy, prioritize
defeating it!

column3: 奴らを倒せば残り時間が延長されるぞ
column4: Defeating them will extend the remaining time!

column3: おお！　ついにエルダードラゴンのお出ましだ！
column4:
Oh! The Elder Dragon has finally made an
appearance!

column3: 覚者たちよ、戦果を目指すなら討伐だ！
column4:
Arisen, if you aim for achievements in battle,
focus on defeating it!

column3: 勇敢なる覚者よ、竜族を狙うのだ！
column4: Brave Arisen, aim for the Dragonkin!

column3: さすれば大物、エルダードラゴンをおびき出せるはずだ！
column4:
If we do that, we should be able to lure out a
formidable creature, the Elder Dragon!

column3: 《時番》を発見したら優先的に討伐するのだ！
column4:
When you find a "Time Bonus" enemy, prioritize
defeating it!

column3: 奴らを倒せば残り時間が延長されるぞ
column4: Defeating them will extend the remaining time!

column3: おお！　ついにエルダードラゴンのお出ましだ！
column4:
Oh! The Elder Dragon has finally made an
appearance!

column3: 覚者たちよ、戦果を目指すなら討伐だ！
column4:
Arisen, if you aim for achievements in battle,
focus on defeating it!

column3: 3種の宝石を集めると、より強大な竜が現れるという噂だ
column4:
Rumor has it that when you collect three types of
Gems, a more powerful dragon will appear.

column3: さらなる大物を狙うならば、挑戦するがいい！
column4: If you want to go even bigger, go for it!

column3:
噂の大物が現れたぞ！
《エルダードラゴン・ブレイズ》のおでましだ！
column4:
The rumored big fish has appeared! It's the Elder
Dragon Blaze!

column3: 討伐できれば戦功をはずむぞ！
column4: If we can subdue them, it will earn us War Merit!

column3: 勇敢なる覚者よ、竜族を狙うのだ！
column4: Brave Arisen, aim for the Dragonkin!

column3: さすれば大物、エルダードラゴンをおびき出せるはずだ！
column4:
If we do that, we should be able to lure out a
formidable creature, the Elder Dragon!

column3: 《時番》を発見したら優先的に討伐するのだ！
column4:
When you find a "Time Bonus" enemy, prioritize
defeating it!

column3: 奴らを倒せば残り時間が延長されるぞ
column4: Defeating them will extend the remaining time!

column3: おお！　ついにエルダードラゴンのお出ましだ！
column4:
Oh! The Elder Dragon has finally made an
appearance!

column3: 覚者たちよ、戦果を目指すなら討伐だ！
column4:
Arisen, if you aim for achievements in battle,
focus on defeating it!

column3:
南の森で恐ろしい魔物を見たという
噂が広がっている
column4:
People have been talking about seeing a terrible
monster in the southern forests.

column3:
まもなく討伐が開始されるだろう――
おまえも参加するならば
準備しておくといい――
column4:
The hunt will begin shortly.
If you're joining in too, be prepared...

column3:
討伐が開始されたなら
再度、私の元に訪れてエントリー
しにきてくれ
column4:
Once the hunt has begun,
visit me once again and come to enlist.
I await your arrival.

column3:
ローガンさんが討伐準備をしている魔物は
異界を渡る力を持つそうです
column4:
The monster that Ser Logan is preparing
to subdue seems to have the power
to travel through different realms.

column3:
多くの覚者さまの力が必要になるため
是非協力してあげて下さいね
column4:
We will need the power of many Arisen for this,
so please lend us your assistance.

column3:
詳しい情報は
《商店区》にある白衛騎士団の詰所にいる
ローガンさんをお訪ねください
column4:
For more information, please visit Ser Logan
at the White Knights' Headquarters
in the Shopping District.

column3:
そういえば、《古の祭祀場》に
強い竜力の淀みが発生していることは
知っている？
column4:
By the way, were you aware
that there is Dragon Force accumulating
in the "Ancient Place of Rituals"?

column3:
オールドグロウエントか、それより
もっと恐ろしい何かか――
column4:
Old Grove Ent, was it?
Or something even more terrifying?

column3:
白衛騎士団も確認に動いているそうよ
神殿の騎士団本部にも
情報を取りに行ってみて
column4:
The White Knights are working to confirm this.
You can also go to the Knights Headquarters
in the Temple to get more information.

column3:
対峙した者の話によれば
相手はケタ違いの化け物らしい
column4:
According to those who have confronted it,
our adversary is of a different caliber.

column3:
命を落とすことのないよう
十分気をつけて戦ってくれ
column4:
Please fight with utmost care,
should you perish.

column3:
挑める準備ができてるなら
さっそくミッションエントリーしてみてくれ
column4:
If you're ready to take on the challenge,
participate in the mission right away.

column3:
また自分の成果がどの程度なのかは
神殿内の各所にあるランキングボードを
確認するといい
column4:
You can also check the ranking boards located
throughout the temple to see how well you did.

column3:
ローガンさんが討伐隊を
動かし始めたみたいです
column4: Ser Logan looks to be preparing for a hunt.

column3:
詳しい情報はレスタニアニュースを確認の上
《商店区》にある白衛騎士団の詰所にいる
ローガンさんをお訪ねください
column4:
For more information, please check the Lestania
News and visit Ser Logan at the White Knights'
Headquarters in the "Shopping District".

column3:
《古の祭祀場》に、恐ろしい魔物が
姿を現したの！
いつものエントなど比較にならない
強大な魔物よ
column4:
A terrible monster has appeared
in the Ancient Place of Rituals!
It's a mighty monster that can't be compared to
the usual Ent...

column3:
今、神殿の騎士団本部が中心となって
討伐隊を組織しているわ
column4:
Right now the headquarters of the Temple Knight
Order is leading the way in organizing a hunting
party.

column3:
貴方もぜひ力を貸して！
このミスリウのためにも――
column4:
Please lend your strength as well!
For the sake of Mysree, too...

column3:
討伐に参加してくれた
多くの勇気ある戦士達のおかげで
あの化け物を退けることができた
column4:
Thanks to the brave soldiers who participated in
the subjugation, we were able to repel that
monster.

column3: 心から礼を言わせてもらうよ
column4: I want to thank you from the bottom of my heart.

column3:
森に現れた魔物を
退けることができたそうです
column4:
We hear that they were able to repel the monster
that appeared in the forest.

column3:
レスタニアニュースでも
取り上げられていますよ
column4: It has also been featured in Lestania News.

column3:
先の森の
魔物討伐における報酬を支給している
column4:
The reward for the forest monsters hunt is
currently being distributed.

column3:
まだのものは
保管ボックスから受け取ってくれ
column4:
Please retrieve the items that are still in the
storage box.

column3:
先の戦闘評価が終わっている――
報酬を支給するので受け取ってくれ
column4:
The previous combat evaluation has ended. Please
collect the reward.

column3: 先の魔物討伐の戦果が発表されています
column4:
The outcome of the previous enemy subjugation has
been announced.

column3:
報酬も支給されていますので
レスタニアニュースにて確認くださいね
column4:
Rewards are also being paid, so please check it
out on Lestania News!

column3: 永遠不変をうそぶく厚顔なる白竜と覚者よ――
column4:
Oh, the arrogant white dragon, who claims to be
eternal—, and you, Arisen――

column3:
永遠なるは我が輝き、不変なるは我が志し――
思い知るがよい――
column4:
My radiance is eternal, my determination
unwavering. You shall come to know this.

column3:
うつろう世にしがみつく
哀れなる白竜と覚者よ――
column4:
Oh pitiful White Dragon and Arisen, clinging to
this fleeting world...

column3:
白がくすみ人が絶えても我が輝きは不滅――
この黄金こそが永遠の象徴――
column4:
Even if the white fades and people disappear, my
brilliance is everlasting.
This gold is a symbol of eternity.

column3: 世界は我が物と信じて疑わぬ白竜と覚者よ――
column4:
O, white dragon who believes the world is theirs
without doubt, and you, Arisen――

column3:
教えてやろう
貴様らが信じる理のもろさを――
column4:
Allow me to show you the fragility of the world
order you believe in.

column3:
伝説で語り継がれた黄金に輝く竜が
空で待っているそうだ
column4:
It is said that a legendary dragon, shining with
golden light, awaits in the sky.

column3:
相手は想像を絶する化け物だ
今から準備をはじめておくといい――
column4:
The enemy is an unimaginable monster.
It's best to start preparing now--

column3:
討伐が開始されたなら
再度、私の元に訪れてエントリー
しにきてくれ
column4:
If the hunt has begun, visit me once again and
come to enlist.
I await your arrival.

column3: 黄金の竜の討伐準備が進んでいます
column4:
Preparations for the defeat of the Golden Dragon
are underway.

column3:
一匹の魔物の討伐とは思えない
大部隊による長期戦になるそうです
column4:
It doesn't seem it'll be like defeating a single
monster.
It appears it will be a long-term battle waged by
a large force.

column3:
それでも――
伝説の竜を打ち倒すことなんて
できるのでしょうか
column4:
Even so...
Is it possible to strike down the legendary
dragon?

column3:
詳しい情報は《商店区》の
海辺の見える竜の礎前にいる
ハンコックさんをお訪ねください
column4:
For more information, please visit Mr. Hancock in
the Shopping District near the Dragon's Portcrystal
with a view of the seashore.

column3: いよいよ生ける伝説、黄金竜との決戦だ
column4:
It's finally the decisive battle with the living
legend, the Golden Dragon.

column3:
この戦いは奴が倒れるまで戦いは引き継がれる
最後まであきらるな
column4:
This battle will not be over until they are
defeated.
We must not give up, no matter how long it takes.

column3:
挑める準備ができてるなら
さっそくミッションエントリーしてみてくれ
column4:
If you're ready to take on the challenge,
participate in the mission right away.

column3:
また自分の成果がどの程度なのかは
神殿内の各所にあるランキングボードを
確認するといい
column4:
You can also check the ranking boards located
throughout the temple to see how well you did.

column3:
黄金の竜の討伐遠征が
始まっています
column4:
The expedition to defeat the Golden Dragon has
begun.

column3:
詳しい情報はレスタニアニュースを確認の上
《商店区》の海辺の見える竜の礎前にいる
ハンコックさんをお訪ねください
column4:
For more information, please check Lestania News
and visit ser Hancock in the Shopping District
near the Dragon's Portcrystal with a view of the
seashore.

column3: 戦果の報告をまとめているところだ
column4:
I'm in the process of summarizing the results of
the battle.

column3:
報酬はその後支給するので
待っていてくれ
column4:
The reward will be distributed afterwards, please
wait.

column3: 遠征が終わったようですね
column4: It seems that the expedition has come to an end.

column3: 本当にあの黄金の竜を倒せたのでしょうか――
column4: Did we really manage to defeat the Golden Dragon?

column3:
先の黄金竜討伐に対する
報酬を支給中だ
column4:
Rewards for the recent defeat of the Golden
Dragon are now being distributed.

column3: 保管ボックスより受け取ってくれ
column4: Please retrieve it from the Storage Box.

column3:
黄金竜討伐の戦果に対する
報酬を支給する
column4:
The reward for the successful elimination of the
Golden Dragon.

column3: 協力に感謝する――ありがとう
column4: We appreciate your cooperation. Thank you.

column3:
先の遠征における戦果が
発表されています
column4:
The results of the recent expedition have been
published.

column3:
報酬も支給されていますので
レスタニアニュースより確認くださいね
column4:
Rewards are being paid, so please check it out in
Lestania News!

column3: 完全なる者たちは何処に――
column4: Where are the perfect ones...

column3:
我に完全を与える主よ――
ここにはいないのか――
column4:
O Lord, grant me perfection—
Is it not here—

column3:
戦いは永遠を知る方便――
空しさなど覚えるものか――
column4:
Battle is the means to know eternity――
Why remember emptiness――

column3:
私の予感だが、ほどなくレスタニアに
暗雲が立ち込めようとしている
column4:
I have a feeling that soon, a dark cloud will
loom over Lestania.

column3:
これは凶悪な魔物があらわれる前兆だ
気をつけるといい
column4:
This is an omen of the coming of a vicious demon.
Be careful.

column3:
魔物が姿を現したならば
再度、私の元を訪れて
討伐隊への参加を期待しているぞ
column4:
If the monsters show themselves, I hope you'll
visit me again and join the hunt team!

column3:
レスタニアで恐ろしい気配を感じたという
噂が流れています
column4:
Rumors are circulating of a frightening presence
in Lestania.

column3:
詳しい情報は
《商店区》にいるコーネリアさんを
お訪ねください
column4:
For more information, please visit ser Cornelia
in the "Shopping District"

column3:
つい最近、レスタニアで
恐ろしい魔物の気配を感じたという
報告が舞い込んできたのだ
column4:
We have recently received reports of a terrifying
demonic presence in Lestania.

column3:
恐るべき魔力の息吹を持つという噂もある
十分に気を付けるといい
column4:
There are rumors that it possesses a breath of
fearsome magical power. It would be wise to be
extremely cautious.

column3:
挑める準備と覚悟ができたなら
さっそく討伐隊に参加してくれ
ファビオ様は重大な用ゆえ
私が窓口を任されている
column4:
If you are prepared and ready for the challenge,
please join the hunting party right away.
Lord Fabio has urgent matters to attend to, so I
have been entrusted with handling the
arrangements.

column3:
また自分の成果がどれほどなのかは
神殿内の各所にあるランキングボードを
確認するといい
column4:
Also, you should check the ranking boards located
throughout the Temple to see how well you did.

column3:
恐るべき異界の魔物の気配が
確認されているそうです
column4:
It seems that the presence of fearsome enemy
creatures from the Other World has been confirmed.

column3:
詳しい情報はレスタニアニュースを確認の上
《商店区》にいるコーネリアさんを
お訪ねください
column4:
For detailed information, please check Lestania
News, then visit Ms. Cornelia in the Commercial
District.

column3:
何とか退けることができたようだな
さすがだ、覚者よ
column4:
It seems that you were able to somehow fend it
off. Truly impressive, Arisen.

column3:
戦果を集計しているところだ
報酬支給はもう少し時間をくれ
column4:
We are currently tallying the results of the
battle. Please give us a little more time for
reward distribution.

column3:
ただいま魔物と交戦した方々の戦果を
集計しています
column4:
We are currently calculating the results of those
who have fought monsters just now.

column3: 発表まで今しばらくお待ちください
column4:
Please wait a little longer until the
announcement.

column3:
魔物討伐の報酬が支給されている
保管ボックスより受け取ってくれ
column4:
The reward for defeating the enemies has been
paid. Please accept it from the Storage Box.

column3:
先の戦闘評価が終わっている
報酬を支給するので受け取ってくれ
column4:
The previous combat evaluation has ended. Please
collect the reward.

column3: 先の魔物討伐の戦果が発表されています
column4:
The outcome of the previous enemy subjugation has
been announced.

column3:
報酬も支給されていますので、
レスタニアニュースにて確認くださいね
column4:
Rewards are also being paid, so please check it
out on Lestania News!

column3: オマイラ――覚えとけよ！
column4: You all―― remember this!

column3: おいおい――調子にのるなって
column4: Hey hey, don't get carried away.

column3: 腐ってもやっぱり覚者か！？
column4:
Even if you're rotten, you're still an Arisen,
huh!?

column3:
２つ以上のミッションには
エントリーできないぞ
column4: You can't enter more than one mission!

column3:
先にエントリーしている方のミッションを
終わらせるか、エントリーを取り消して
再度こちらに来るんだ
column4:
Either finish the mission you've already entered,
or cancel your entry, then come back again.

column3:
ボルド大坑道へ調査にいったゲルト団長から
緊急指令が届いているんだ
column4:
I've got an urgent order from Commander Gerd, who
went to the Volden Large Tunnels to investigate.

column3:
準備を整えたら、ミッションエントリーをしてくれ
俺も共に向かうぞ
column4:
Once you're ready, please enter the mission.
I will also join you.

column3:
――先のミッションで物凄い戦果を
挙げたそうだな
column4:
I heard you achieved an amazing victory in the
previous mission.

column3:
特別なアビリティを与えるよう言われている
ふん――役に立つと良いがな
column4:
I've been told to give you a special Augment.
Well, I hope it proves useful.

column3:
ボルド大坑道でのミッション、ご苦労だったな
――助かった、礼をいう
column4:
Thank you for your hard work on the Volden Large
Tunnels mission. I am grateful for your help.

column3:
戦果についての確認が終わり次第
保管ボックスにて報酬を受け取れるようになる
受け取りを忘れるなよ
column4:
After the results have been confirmed, you will
be able to receive your reward in the Storage Box.
Don't forget to pick it up.

column3: 魔赤島にアルタード・ズールが現れた
column4: An Altered Zuhl has appeared on Bloodbane Isle.

column3:
こんなことを覚者に頼むのも癪だが――
かなり切迫した状況だ
column4:
Even though it pains me to have to burden the
Arisen with this, it's a very desperate situation.

column3:
駐屯地が危険にさらされている――
すぐに準備を整え、ミッションエントリーを
して欲しい
――食い止めてくれ
column4:
The garrison is in danger!
Join the mission, now, please.
...Stop them!

column3:
――貴君は他のミッションの元に
パーティを組んでいるな
column4: You are in a party for another mission.

column3:
先にそちらのミッションの参加予定を
取り消し、あらためてここに来てくれ
column4:
Please cancel your participation in the mission
over there first, and then come here again.

column3:
今回も何とか魔物を退けたな
――我々への協力、感謝する
column4:
Once again, we managed to drive away the monsters.
Thank you for your cooperation.

column3:
ミッションの戦果が発表された者から
保管ボックスより順次報酬を渡すぞ
column4:
We'll distribute rewards sequentially from the
storage box to those whose mission achievements
have been announced.

column3:
先の戦いについて
多くの戦果を挙げた貴君に対して
特別なアビリティが送られることになった
column4:
As a reward for your many
accomplishments achieved in that last battle,
you will receive a special Augment.

column3: ぜひ受け取ってくれ――
column4: Please accept it with gratitude--

column3:
"シェドレアン大神殿"での問題を
解決してくれたみたいね！
アデルドナハからも、礼をいっておいてくれと
言われたよ――
column4:
It seems like you solved the problem
that beset the Shadolean Great Temple!
Adair Donnchadh told me to thank you...

column3:
今は戦果の分析中だから
もうしばらく待っていてちょうだい
column4:
I'm in the process of analyzing the war results,
so you'll have to wait a while longer.

column3:
今回のミッションでは物凄いはたらきを
してくれたみたいね！
column4: You did a tremendous job on this mission!

column3:
戦果の報酬として、シークレットアビリティが
付与されるよ
受け取ってちょうだい
column4:
As a reward for your battle results,
you will receive a Secret Augment.
Please accept it.

column3:
ダクレイム砦でのウォーミッションは終了した
現在、各個人の戦果を確認しているところだ
column4:
The war mission at Dacreim Fortress has ended.
We are currently checking each individual's
achievements.

column3: 集計が終わるまで、しばらくの間待っていてほしい
column4:
Please wait a while for the tally
to be completed.

column3:
あんたの持っているDPと引き換えに
品物を提供しよう
ラインナップを確認してみてくれ
column4:
In exchange for the DP you possess,
I can offer these goods.
Please take a look at the lineup.

column3:
一部のアイテムには、条件を満たした者にしか
与えられない特別なアイテムが存在する
column4:
There are special items that can only be given
to those who meet the requirements.

column3:
戦いにおいて、どれだけの成果を達成したかにより
提供できるアイテムも変わってくるぞ
column4:
The items that can be obtained through battle
depend on the achievements made therein.

column3: 敵陣を制圧完了！（残り３ヶ所）
column4: Enemy stronghold successfully captured! (3 left)

column3: 敵陣を制圧完了！（残り２ヶ所）
column4: Enemy stronghold successfully captured! (2 left)

column3: 敵陣を制圧完了！（残り１ヶ所）
column4: Enemy stronghold successfully captured! (1 left)

column3: 砦２階を塞ぐ扉が開いた！
column4: The door blocking the 2nd floor of the fortress has opened!

column3:
覚者を狙う大砲が増強された！
戦況が悪化していく――
column4:
The large-bore cannons that target Arisen
have been strengthened!
The situation is getting worse...

column3:
敵軍設備増強を防いだ――
戦況ゲージが回復した！
column4:
Prevented enemy reinforcement.
War status gauge has recovered!

column3: 覚悟と兆し
column4: Resolutions and Omens

column3:
オーク軍の襲撃を受けているグリッテン砦に向かい
レオ、イリスとともに援軍として戦闘に参加する
column4:
Fort Gritten is being raided by the Orc army.
Join the battle with Leo and Iris as reinforcements.

Join the battle with Leo and Iris as reinforcements.

and the White Guard Knights.

砦攻防戦に参じる

Head to Fort Gritten, 
which has been occupied by Orcs, join forces
with a mixed unit of Arisen and White Guard Knights
to participate in the fort's siege defense.
